response.overview: Converge "Jane Live" is the classic "Jane Doe" album performed and recorded live in its entirety at Roadburn Festival in The Netherlands. The set was mixed by Converge guitarist Kurt Ballou at God City Studio and mastered by Brad Boatright at Audiosiege. For limited vinyl versions of the double album, the iconic J. Bannon cover was reimagined by artists Florian Bertmer, John Baizley, Randy Ortiz, and Thomas Hooper. Each giving their unique interpretation on the classic artwork. While Ashley Rose Coutureâ€™s stunning real life reconstruction of the cover adorns the release on all formats.
response.tagline: Official video of Converge "Jane Live", recorded at Roadburn Festival 2016.
response.title: Converge "Jane LIve"
